data.title: Dodge County Achievment Center / Performace Learning Center
meta_keywords: Dodge County Achievment Center / Performace Learning Center
data.meta_description: Home - Dodge County Achievment Center / Performace Learning Center
data.text:
Hello Families!

Your opinion matters to us, so we are asking you to complete this short survey, which will provide us with feedback regarding your experience with the Family Engagement Program at your child's school. If you have students at multiple schools, please complete a survey for each school.

We will use results to help us plan and improve our Family Engagement Program for next year. The results will be posted on the district and each school's website before the end of the school year.

Thank you for your continued support of our school system! Please complete the survey using the link below.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/17HJvB1WbNRamQIw3PXkMa5zo4Xi7VkK5tfI5pbN1LjY/viewform?edit_requested=true

or by using this QR Code:
